title: Is there anything that can be done here??
body:
Ok, so i was playing some ranked when in this one game I got a particularly toxic couple of players and they did not stop jabbing at the rest of our team for every little mistake they made, i happened to give my laners a couple of kills so i was going to feel the wrath of these two guys and let me tell you i havn't played with such toxic people since about a year ago when i used to be in bronze. It only took 2 minutes for our lucian the Fresh to start shitting on our brand support about something and** threatening to go afk **if brand tried to go back botlane. Something else noticeable was that our midlane corki afked for a few minutes, and i am 99% sure this was because of them flaming him for feeding since he was 0/2. Needless to say we lost the game fairly quickly and with the chat filled with "f*cking trash c*nts" and "please learn how to play league" etc.
But what i realised at the after game lobby screen was that they were duoed_ since they never flamed and always agreed with each other and surely enough i searched them the fresh up and i saw  that they were duoed. And now this has made me have very high suspicions that this duo is particularly toxic and flames teams in most of their other games.

In all of my 2618 league of legend games i have never gotten so tilted by someone to go to the bother of spending 30 minutes making a post on trying to get someone punished, i would really like to see these guys get some punishment like maybe even just a chat restriction might help them reform.

replies.body:
Don't worry, the new report system is great on picking up on chat based toxicity. If these guys were toxic and you reported them, then they'll be punished. I know it sucks when you queue with people like this, but by reporting them you're doing a great service for **OCE** as a whole.

> As a side note though;
> 
> I'm going to need you to remove the summoner names from the post. It's a direct violation of naming and shaming. You can read more about it [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) (you'll find it under the _"Reporting Other Players"_ section).

> Get that done ASAP, to avoid any issues! ;)

Just to add to this you can read more about our systems here
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Y9YJ60Fn-player-behaviour-faq

> How does Instant Feedback work?
> 
> The best place to read up on it is Lyte's post here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/new-player-reform-system-heads-testing
> 
> It's also important to remember that this system is constantly being fine-tuned by the Player Behaviour team. The settings are conservative right now and will be ramped up aggressively over time.

I've edited out the name and shame.

naming and shaming is a nono btw.

The sense of achievery when you first get someone banned (stupid fizz) http://imgur.com/Asvsjb2 personally now have 10 people banned

also when you know you carried the game. http://imgur.com/sXmFR6A
